description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F3-TWAMP-MIB::twampSessionSenderThresholdCrossingAlert F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdIndex i 9999 F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdAbsValueLo u 9999 F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdAbsValueHi u 9999 F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
variables.name: F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdIndex

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled. Objects of the f3TwampStatsTable are
monitored. Only variables that resolve to an ASN.1 primitive
type of INTEGER (INTEGER, Integer32, Counter32, PerfCounter64
Gauge, or TimeTicks) may be sampled.
variables.name: F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the absolute value of the threshold.
variables.name: F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdAbsValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the absolute value of the threshold.
variables.name: F3-TWAMP-MIB::f3TwampStatsThresholdAbsValueHi
